Where the hell did he go?
It is midday, but it is been such a pain in the ass
trying to find him in here.
I think Dio was in that room over there...
They happily let him drink up all their blood.
I will never understand what they are thinking.
I guess he is charming as the Devil himself.
And while I am at it, where did he get
all these treasures and art pieces from?
I guess there is nothing he cannot do.
J-Just standing in front of him sends chills up my spine.
Do not let him overwhelm you.
He is only a little stronger than me, maybe...
I asked you what you are doing here, Hol Horse.
I-I came to give my report.
It appears that the fifth and sixth of the
Nine Gods, Mariah and Alessi, have both been defeated.
Joestar and the others will arrive in Cairo tomorrow.
Only three of the Nine Gods remain.
I was talking about you, Hol Horse.
When are you going to fight them for me, Hol Horse?
You swore loyalty to me, but you have not really fought at all.
My body, from the neck down, once belonged to a man named Jonathan Joestar.
See how the left side is slower to heal?
The left side of this body is weak.
That proves this body is not yet completely mine.
That I am not immortal yet.
So I am not yet prepared to face them.
I expect you to kill Joestar and the others for me this time.
Y-You have got to be shitting me!
Is he trying to drive me into a corner?
I just side with whoever's strongest.
I did not swear loyalty to you from the bottom of my heart.
I am not going to sell you my soul.
Are you even all that strong?
Maybe your body is not moving the way you want it to yet...
C-Come to think of it, instead of fighting the four guys in Joestar's party...
It would be quicker and easier to blow his head to smithereens
Then all that treasure will be mine.
I am pointing the Emperor's barrel right at him, and he has not even noticed.
I can finish him off now.
Just got to pull the trigger...
It will be over in an instant.
The Emperor was made for killing at point blank range!
I will leave your brains all over the floor, Mister Dio!
Are you really trying to shoot me?
At the moment you tried to kill me,
you were not sweating, and your breathing was even.
As I would expect from Hol Horse.
I-I could not see him move.
He did not tear through any of these spider webs.
There is no way he could have gotten behind me!
How did he get behind me?
Was that Dio's Stand, The World?
You are not ready to fight them?
that I have no choice but to follow you.
Episode 36 Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 1
Ladies and gentlemen, we hope you enjoyed your flight from Aswan.
Our plane will momentarily land on schedule at Cairo International Airport.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
Looks like we got to this taxi first.
Take me to the Mena House hotel in Giza.
I am going to open up the trunk,
so do not let the sudden light hurt your eyes.
Did you just say something, sir?
I was not talking to you.
Shut up and keep your eyes on the road.
Mondatta, I had no choice but to drag you
onto the plane since you would not cooperate.
Do not be a baby, Mondatta.
Since he got blown up by a bomb,
your brother's stuck in the hospital for another month.
You are going to team up with me now.
With your book of premonitions and my assassin's gun together,
we are going to kill Joestar's group.
I know that you are an introvert who will not trust anyone
But do not you want to avenge your brother?
Do you want to grow up a coward, Mondatta?
I am doing my best, too!
I am going to untie you now.
Can you promise you will not cry or scream?
Anyway, l-let us be pals, Mondatta.
He is super mean and a total jerk!
While I was sleeping, he tied me up and stuffed me in a trunk,
and took me away from my brother Zenyatta.
But even though I am scared, in order to avenge my brother,
I worked up my courage and paired up with Hol Horse.
So even though you are too scared to get close to me,
you are trying to be brave in your own way.
Is it really true that your Stand's predictions are always right?
I trusted the rumors and decided to team up with you,
but your brother's failure worries me a bit.
A new comic appeared on the blank page...
were walking along the outskirts of Cairo,
we met a very pretty lady.
After being kicked, the lady was so happy,
she gave Hol Horse some jewels.
You have got to be kidding me!
You call this a prediction, Mondatta?!
There is no way this could happen!
What kind of woman would be so happy about getting kicked
in the neck that she would give me jewels?
When it comes to women, no one's a nicer guy than me.
I have girlfriends all over the world.
I may lie to women, but I have never hit one!
It does not matter to me if she is ugly or beautiful.
This prediction will not come true.
Because I swear, I would never hit a woman.
And even if someone paid me a ton of money, I would never kick one.
There was a scorpion inside my lady's collar!
And it is a highly venomous species!
before it could crawl into my clothes.
If he had not crushed it, you would have been stung...
Please, allow me to thank you.
Mondatta, and I, Hol Horse, are an invincible duo!
The building in this picture, huh?
I have been repairing roofs in Cairo for forty years,
but I have never seen this place.
But judging from the look of the building,
it must have been built over a hundred years ago.
find it eventually if you look south of here.
The further south you go in Cairo, the older the buildings are.
Sorry I could not be much help.
She will only last three or four more days.
I can feel him hiding somewhere around here.
If we keep asking around, we will find him.
We meet again, you familiar faces...
To think they have gotten so close to Lord Dio's mansion...
There is no way something that ridiculous could actually happen!
Are you telling me to believe this?
I have finally found you... Joestar, Jotaro, Polnareff, and Avdol!
They are getting closer and closer to Lord Dio's mansion.
I am just going to shoot you in the face right now!
But, Hol Horse, you should not even think
about using the Emperor in the marketplace.
Now, Hol Horse, stick your fingers up Polnareff's nose, and then...
Everyone is bleeding and out cold!
This is your chance to kill them all!
Like hell I am going to believe that!
Stick my fingers up Polnareff's nose?!
I get that it is a chance to kill them all, but it is absolutely ludicrous.
Even if that happened, I would have to get close enough
to a strong guy like Polnareff to stick my fingers up his nose.
Would not it be much faster if I just shot him with my Emperor?
Y-You will not be able to f-fire a bullet, yes.
E-Even if you try to shoot, fate will make you follow the comic, yes.
I-If you try to go against what is drawn in the comics,
M-My brother was trying to save himself
and transformed into Jotaro without thinking, yes.
If he had trusted the comic and not transformed,
then the real Jotaro would have blown up, yes.
The predictions are not wrong, yes.
He disappeared all of a sudden.
Or I will put a hole in you.
Keep your hands where I can see them.
I thought I saw someone stalking us like a hyena,
and if it is not a visit from my old friend, Mr. Hol Horse.
Still have not learned your lesson?
You took real good care of us in India.
or I would have killed you the second I saw you here.
Nah, you would not be here alone.
I am sure you have got someone nearby.
At least he does not seem to have noticed Mondatta yet.
You are not scary on your own,
but you have a talent for discovering other people's talents.
Once you team up with someone who has talent,
So where is the Stand user you have partnered up with?
If he finds you, we are finished!
You got hit because you tried to use your gun.
Th-Then our victory will be absolute, yes.
Hey, what is under that box?
Hey, Polnareff, did you find the guy following us?
Believe, and somehow stick your fingers up Polnareff's nose, yes!
I just have to do it, right?
He is looking the other way!
I know you are hiding under there!
Everyone is bleeding and out cold!
This is your chance to kill them all!
So, when the hell is this chance coming?
What am I supposed to do now?
What the hell are you doing, Hol Horse?
I would like to know myself!
What the hell am I supposed to do after this?
What am I supposed to follow up with?
Th-The other three are coming this way!
How am I supposed to make it like the prediction from here?
What the hell am I supposed to do?!
It is a sign for you to look behind me!
Looks like there was a car accident over there.
I made tea, so have some lunch.
Once I stuck my fingers up his nose, the prediction came true.
